original_title: Tales from the Crypt: New Year's Shockin' Eve
overview: An exclusive all-new interstitial content for the first time in 15 years. See the Cryptkeeper take a blast through the past, decomposing the best of the '70s, '80s, '90s and '00s, on his way to welcoming in 2013.
title: Tales from the Crypt: New Year's Shockin' Eve
